H0.text: Having held the position since 2004, Richard Wallace is the editor of which daily newspaper. The Daily Mirror

H1.text: Having held the position since 2004, Richard Wallace is the editor of which daily newspaper. The Sun

H2.text: Having held the position since 2004, Richard Wallace is the editor of which daily newspaper. The Daily Telegraph

H3.text: Having held the position since 2004, Richard Wallace is the editor of which daily newspaper. The Scurra

A4.text: Richard Wallace was appointed editor of the Daily Mirror in 2004.
